title: Nine from Little Rock
brief_description: A summary of the individual achievements of the nine African American students who entered the Central High School in Little Rock, Arkansas following the integration of the school in 1957.
description: A summary of the individual achievements of the nine African American students who entered the Central High School in Little Rock, Arkansas following the integration of the school in 1957.
